translated: The Buddha Speaks the Secret of the Unfailing King of the Holy AvalokitÃªÅ›vara Bodhisattva
The Buddha Speaks the Secret Mind DhÄraá¹‡Ä« of the Unfailing King of the Holy AvalokitÃªÅ›vara Bodhisattva SÅ«tra
Tripiá¹­aka Master from the Western Regions, Chao Feng Da Fu Shi Guang Lu Qing,
Dharma-transmitting Great Master, Bestowed with Purple Robes, Shi Hu and others respectfully translated by imperial decree. Thus have I heard.
At one time the World-Honored One was in the palace of the holy AvalokitÃªÅ›vara Bodhisattva on Mount Potalaka.
There were innumerable great Å›Äla trees.
TÄmalipta trees, campaka trees,
aÅ›oka trees, atimÅ«ktaka trees.
Such various jeweled trees were used for adornment.
He was with a great assembly of bhiká¹£us, one hundred and eighty thousand.
Bodhisattvas, ninety koá¹­Ä«s of nayutas of hundreds of thousands.
There were also the great ÄªÅ›vara and MaheÅ›vara and other BrahmÄ princes.
And innumerable hundreds of thousands of pure light princes.
Such assemblies respectfully surrounded him and listened to the Dharma being expounded.
At that time, the Bodhisattva MahÄsattva AvalokitÃªÅ›vara rose from his seat.
He bared his right shoulder and kneeled on his right knee.
He joined his palms in respect and bowed his head to the Buddha.
With a bright smile, he addressed the Buddha, saying:
World-Honored One, I have a dhÄraá¹‡Ä« called the Unfailing King, which is a secret mind.
In the past, ninety-one kalpas ago,
I personally received it from the TathÄgata AvalokitÃªÅ›vara in the world of Universal Observation.
At that time, the TathÄgata, for the sake of countless hundreds of thousands of Brahma princes and the assembly of the sons of pure light,
Taught the Dharma of supreme, perfect enlightenment.
At that time, I attained hundreds of thousands of samÄdhi gates, such as the unfailing wisdom.
World-Honored One, if in any place this secret mind dhÄraá¹‡Ä« is proclaimed and circulated,
One should know that in that place, the great self and the twelve thousand princes will secretly guard and protect it.
That place will be the same as having stÅ«pas of the buddhas.
Should be respected, revered, and made offerings to.
Moreover, if there are people who widely disseminate this secret mind dhÄraá¹‡Ä« of the Unfailing King,
One should know that this person has already deeply planted wholesome roots in the presence of countless koá¹­is of nayutas of hundreds of thousands of Buddhas.
Moreover, if there are people who temporarily get to hear this dhÄraá¹‡Ä«,
Even if this person slanders the Buddha, slanders the Dharma,
And slanders the sages such as Bodhisattvas, Sravakas, Pratyekabuddhas, and so forth,
And widely creates such extremely grave evil karma,
They will fall into the Avici Hell.
If they are able to wholeheartedly fast for one day,
And recite this dhÄraá¹‡Ä« according to the method,
Such sins will all be eradicated.
Moreover, if there are people suffering from various fevers,
Whether for one day, two days, up to seven days,
Or eye pain, ear pain, nose pain, or headache,
Or leprosy, sores, boils, carbuncles, or blisters,
And for all non-human evil ghosts,
Clinging, holding, restraining, binding, beating, striking,
Cursing, threatening, and confusing with wrong teachings.
To put it simply,
Gathering all illnesses of the body and mind,
Up to seeing inauspicious things in dreams.
By the power of the empowerment of this dhÄraá¹‡Ä«,
All will be eliminated and no harm will be able to occur.ğŸ”½World-Honored One, moreover, if there are deceitful and deceptive people among the ká¹£atriyas, brahmins, vaiÅ›yas, and Å›Å«dras,
Such clans and surnames,
They are also allowed to listen to, receive, copy, and recite this dhÄraá¹‡Ä«.
Up to all the different kinds of animals,
They should also be made to think of this dhÄraá¹‡Ä« and hear it.
Having heard it, they will all attain benefits as appropriate.
How much more so for those who give rise to a mind of pure faith and understanding,
Bhiká¹£us, bhiká¹£uá¹‡Ä«s, upÄsakas, and upÄsikÄs,
Who listen to and receive this dhÄraá¹‡Ä« with a sincere mind.
Moreover, there are people,
If one contemplates this secret dhÄraá¹‡Ä« phrase with a sincere mind,
At that time, one should be free from all faults.
Namely, not slandering, not praising, not giving rise to doubt.
Give rise to a mind free from self, without a mind of near and far,
Without a mind of fabrication, without a defiled mind, without a mind of high and low.
Abiding in such a mind, contemplate the Buddha.
That person will then see a thousand Buddhas in the ten directions appear before them.
World-Honored One, if in the houses of laypeople,
There is this DhÄraá¹‡Ä« SÅ«tra,
Whether the master or servants see this sÅ«tra,
If they give rise to contempt or even jest,
By the power of my awesome spiritual abilities,
Cause them to naturally hear the sound of this DhÄraá¹‡Ä«.
World-Honored One, it is like a person taking sandalwood incense,
Or dragon brain or musk,
Holding it to knock or even chop it up.
And using incantations to curse it.
and grind it on a rough stone.
Use it to anoint the body.
Some people say:
Do not need to beat, chop, chant, grind,
After sandalwood and other fragrances have been applied to the body,
The fragrance always remains.
World-Honored One, this secret mind dhÄraá¹‡Ä« of the Unfailing King is also like this.
If there are people who, although born, are still frivolous or even playful,
Up to not having a sincere mind,
But are able to make offerings to this dhÄraá¹‡Ä«,
That person, by the power of the wholesome roots of these offerings,
Will in every life always obtain precepts, concentration, wisdom, and so forth,
And be endowed with the wonderful fragrance of the aggregates.
Furthermore, if there are bhiká¹£us, bhiká¹£uá¹‡Ä«s, upÄsakas, upÄsikÄs, and so forth,
Who wish to uphold this secret mind dhÄraá¹‡Ä« of the Unfailing King,
When the time comes, they should set up the ritual arena according to the Dharma and make offerings.
The practitioner should be pure and not eat.
Recite this secret mind dhÄraá¹‡Ä« seven times with a mind free from conditions.
This person will attain twenty kinds of merits.
First, they will be born into a wealthy and noble family.
Second, after being born, any karmic illnesses from past lives will quickly be eliminated.
Third, they will always have a body that is smooth, wonderful, and excellent.
Their faculties will be hidden and people will love them.
Fourth, they will obtain great wealth and profit.
Fifth, their wealth and treasures will not be stolen.
Sixth, their wealth and treasures will not be burned by fire or drowned in water.
Seventh, they will always obtain the expansion of their fields.
Eighth, the crops in their fields will not be damaged by thunder and hail.
Ninth, their fields will not be harmed by evil rains or continuous downpours.
Tenth, their complexion, strength, and spirit will not be diminished.
Eleventh, they will always be respected and loved by all beings.
Twelfth, they will not be afraid of any enemies.
Thirteenth, if there are enemies, they will quickly be resolved.
Fourteenth, not being afraid of any non-human beings.
Fifteenth, not being bound by evil illnesses.
Sixteenth, being free from the fear of nÄgÄs.
Seventeenth, being free from all afflictions and other matters.
Eighteenth, not dying in water, fire, weapons, or from poison.
Nineteenth, always being secretly guarded by sages and saints wherever one is.
Twentieth, always being able to be inseparable from loving-kindness, compassion, joy, and equanimity wherever one is born.
These are called the twenty kinds of merits.
Furthermore, World-Honored One, if there are those who uphold and recite this dhÄraá¹‡Ä«,
They will separately obtain eight kinds of good signs.
First, at the time of death, I will appear before them in the form of a bhiká¹£u.
Second, at the time of death, their eyes will not move or be disturbed, and their body and mind will be at ease.
Third, at the time of death, their hands will not clutch at empty space, and their feet will not kick.
There will also be no messy soiling from feces and urine.
Fourth, they will not die with their face covered.
Fifth, at the time of death, they will be able to maintain right mindfulness.
Sixth, at the time of death, they will not be separated from good friends.
Seventh, after death, they will be able to be reborn in any buddha-land according to their wishes.
Eighth, they will attain inexhaustible eloquence.
These are called the eight auspicious signs.
Furthermore, World-Honored One,
if there are people who can purify themselves and not eat meat,
and avoid the five pungent scallions and all other pungent and mixed [foods],
and recite this dharani three times a day,
all their wishes will be fulfilled.
Moreover, if there are people who can hear this secret mind dharani of the Unfailing King,
if they can eliminate all stinginess and jealousy and remove all defilements,
and with a pure mind respectfully take refuge in and secretly protect it,
these people will be counted among the bodhisattvas.
They will greatly benefit sentient beings
and will ultimately attain the fruit of Buddhahood.
World-Honored One, this word 'bodhi' is precisely right wisdom.
'Sattva' is precisely skillful means.
If one attains the completeness of these two dharmas of wisdom and skillful means,
one will be able to benefit sentient beings.
At that time, the Holy AvalokitÃªÅ›vara Bodhisattva-MahÄsattva again addressed the Buddha, saying:
World-Honored One, I now wish to proclaim in the presence of the TathÄgata
the secret mind dhÄraá¹‡Ä«,
so that the four assemblies in the assembly may hear it and attain benefit and peace,
and also so that all others who commit offenses may obtain good benefits.
The Buddha told the Holy AvalokitÃªÅ›vara Bodhisattva-MahÄsattva:
Pure Great Being, you should speak well now is the right time.
The TathÄgata will also rejoice today.
Even in the latter age,
you will be a good refuge for those who cultivate the bodhisattva vehicle.
At that time, the Holy AvalokitÃªÅ›vara Bodhisattva joyfully raised his eyes to look up at the World-Honored One.
He addressed the Buddha, saying:
The assembly of bodhisattvas here,
Should listen well and again take refuge.
This liberation wheel can bring benefit and comfort to many people.
Compassionate for the world, it skillfully accomplishes all great beneficial and joyful matters.
I will now proclaim this dhÄraá¹‡Ä«.
I first take refuge in the Buddhas, Bodhisattvas, and the well-abiding ones of the past, future, and present,
As well as all the Å›rÄvakas and pratyekabuddhas of the three times.
I also take refuge in the TathÄgata, the Worthy of Offerings, the Perfectly Enlightened One of Immeasurable Light.
I take refuge in Maitreya and the other Bodhisattva MahÄsattvas.
I take refuge in the greatly wise ÅšÄriputra and the other Arhats.
Then he spoke the dhÄraá¹‡Ä«, saying:

The armor dhÄraá¹‡Ä« is as follows:ğŸ”½The head dhÄraá¹‡Ä« is as follows:
The topknot dhÄraá¹‡Ä« is as follows:ğŸ”½Oá¹ƒ hrÄ«á¸¥ jaá¸¥ svaha.
World-Honored One, this dhÄraá¹‡Ä« of mine
can accomplish all tasks.
If one always recites it, one's undertakings will be successful.
Moreover, if there are people who have committed the five heinous crimes,
if they are able to recite this dhÄraá¹‡Ä« three times a day,
all their karmic hindrances will be purified.
If one wishes to perform the method of establishing a boundary,
One should use this dhÄraá¹‡Ä« to empower agalloch incense and use it according to the Dharma.
If one wishes to stop malaria,
one should empower ash water.
Or use a peg made of khadira wood according to the Dharma.
If one wishes to eliminate all illnesses,
one should empower ghee, oil, or water and use them for anointing, etc.
If one wishes to stop the illness caused by being possessed by a kÄraá¹‡á¸a ghost,
one should empower a knife and use it according to the Dharma.
If one wishes to perform various protective methods,
one should empower a thread and use it according to the Dharma.
If one wishes to stop stomach pain,
empower salt water and drink it according to the Dharma.
If one wishes to eliminate all evil poisons,
empower soil or empower water and use it according to the Dharma.
If one wishes to remove eye diseases,
empower a white thread and tie it to the ear.
If one wishes to remove toothache,
empower a tooth stick made of karavÄ«ra wood and use it.
If one wishes to perform the rite of establishing a boundary,
one should take five-colored thread, empower it twenty-one times,
use khadira wood to make stakes, and drive them into the four corners of the boundary.
Then take the thread and measure out the boundary.
This is the accomplishment of establishing the boundary.
If one wishes to perform the rite of protection,
one should empower water or ash from a charnel ground,
or else use pure thread as appropriate.
If one wishes to release all those who are possessed,
empower five-colored thread and use it according to the method.
If one wishes to cure all malaria,
empower white thread and use it according to the method.
If one wishes to remove goiters and all sores and swellings,
empower Triphala and apply it mixed with honey.
If one wishes to remove eye diseases,
empower perfumed water or licorice water,
or use water in which basil leaves have been soaked.
If one wishes to stop all battles and disputes,
empower pure water and wash one's face with it.
If one wishes to protect the king's country and territory,
and prevent any encroachment or strong attacks,
one should choose a fine and good vase or vessel, place it in a clean spot,
fill it with water, and make various offerings.
The practitioner should wear fresh and clean clothes,
recite this dhÄraá¹‡Ä«, and empower it.
Then, take the water from the vase and sprinkle it everywhere.
One will then attain peace and security in the country, and calamities will not arise.
Humans and animals will all be able to guard and protect.
If one wishes to undo various evil seals,
one should use sandalwood incense powder, empower it twenty-one times,
and apply it to one's heart. One will then be able to undo them.
If one wishes to perform protection in one's own dwelling,
one should use lotus flowers to perform the homa ritual.
If one wishes to subdue those who are difficult to subdue,
one should use sandalwood incense to perform the homa ritual.
Next, the method of accomplishment.ğŸ”½One should use the most excellent incense and the supreme incense,
the incense of the fearless hand and the incense of the imperial hand.
Varuni incense, nakuli incense,
nakuli incense, biliyangyu incense,
tagarana incense, and so on.
And the moon king medicine, wonderful joyful pleasure,
wheel medicine, great wheel medicine,
vishnugandha medicine.
Take the above incense and medicines, mix them together to make one pill.
Empower it with this dharani one hundred and eight times.
If there are people who are possessed by ghosts and spirits, frightened,
either wear it on the head or on the arm, it can immediately protect them.
If there is a woman about to give birth,
take the above incense and medicine, crush them into powder,
empower them according to the method, and mix them into water.
Use it to bathe, and then give birth.
The child with superior blessings and virtues will be safe and without difficulty.
All inauspicious events will be eliminated.
Moreover, after birth, it will be well protected.
Free from suffering and evil poison will not arise.
If it does arise, it will be quickly removed.
If a newborn child wishes to be protected,
Take the previously mentioned fragrant medicine pill and empower it according to the method.
Wear it on the crown of the head and it will be able to protect.
If you wish to stop wind, clouds, thunder, and hail,
Take a branch from a bhurja tree.
Enter pure water and empower it according to the method.
Next, hold the branch and use it to sprinkle.
World-Honored One, this secret mind dhÄraá¹‡Ä« of mine
Can accomplish the most supreme.
All the methods mentioned above will be accomplished without fail.
Even if the recitation is not yet proficient, it will still lead to accomplishment.
Furthermore, the method for accomplishing the deity is proclaimed.
If a person wishes to see my body and seek accomplishment,
On the fifteenth day of the bright half of the month, create an image according to the method.
Use the best unmixed colors to paint my form,
With the appearance of MaheÅ›vara.
Wearing a jeweled crown and a deerskin sash,
Adorned with all kinds of precious treasures.
Having painted it in this way, arrange it according to the Dharma.
The practitioner should be in front of that image.
Make a maá¹‡á¸ala with cow bezoar.
Scatter various wonderful flowers and place the eight kinds of incense for offering.
Also set out sixty-four kinds of food and drink.
Use pure things free from blood, meat, fishy impurities, and defilements.
Burn agarwood incense.
The practitioner should fast day and night.
Bathe the body three times a day and wear new clean clothes.
With a focused mind, make offerings.
In front of the image, recite this dhÄraá¹‡Ä« one thousand and eighty times.
Then contemplate the appearance of the deity.
You will see a great blazing flame on your own body.
When the practitioner sees this, joy arises in the mind.
In an instant, you will see my body come and appear before you.
Grant all that is sought and fulfill them all.
At that time, the practitioner should use realgar.
Or use the medicine of anjana to apply to the eyes.
One can then become invisible and also fly in the sky.
Freely enter the samadhi gate of the adornment of the wisdom of the Void.
All that is done according to one's wishes will be perfectly accomplished.
After the Buddha spoke this sutra,
The Bodhisattva-Mahasattva Avalokitesvara,
And the Brahma Heaven assembly of other great self-majesties and supreme self-majesties,
And the Pure Light Celestial Son, as well as all the Bodhisattvas, Sravakas, and the great assembly,
Having heard what the Buddha said, all greatly rejoiced, believed, received and practiced it.
